ModMetaData.name: Med-World Alchemy
ModMetaData.author: Bud8013
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.0.0

Med-World is a collection of several mods to both expand the core medieval tech-level and create a medieval only playthrough using external mods.

This mod is an Add-on for the Med-World Collection and adds Chemfuel-related items, which can be used for the new buildings added and new recipes.
